lead_paragraph: The history of a duo working for a Singaporean match-fixing syndicate reveals how pervasively illicit gambling operations have infected global soccer.
snippet: The history of a duo working for a Singaporean match-fixing syndicate reveals how pervasively illicit gambling operations have infected global soccer.
